id: Stacey Abrams, beaten but not defeated, vows voting rights fight
paragraph: Rachel Maddow reports on Democratic gubernatorial candidate Stacey Abrams' non-concession speech in which she acknowledged that she was out of legal options to contest Brian Kemp's victory, but vowed continued legal action over Georgia's voting rights abuses under Kemp.Nov. 17, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
